headline: Apollo Global Q3: Earnings Beat, Fee Related Earnings +22.8%
summary: Apollo Global Management, Inc. is rated a Buy due to robust growth, strong inflows and continued outperformance. Learn more about APO stock here.

headline: Apollo Funds to Acquire Prosol Group, a Leading French Fresh Food Retailer
summary: Investment Supports Growth of Prosol’s Proprietary Fresh Food Model and Distinctive Customer PropositionNEW YORK, Dec. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo (NYSE: APO) today announced that Apollo-managed funds (the “Apollo Funds”) have agreed to acquire a majority stake in Prosol Group (“Prosol” or the “Company”), the multi-specialist in fresh food businesses and food retail in France, from Ardian. Prosol’s existing shareholders and management team will reinvest alongside the Apollo Funds. Founde

raw.headline: Apollo Funds to Acquire Prosol Group, a Leading French Fresh Food Retailer
raw.summary: Investment Supports Growth of Prosol’s Proprietary Fresh Food Model and Distinctive Customer PropositionNEW YORK, Dec. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo (NYSE: APO) today announced that Apollo-managed funds (the “Apollo Funds”) have agreed to acquire a majority stake in Prosol Group (“Prosol” or the “Company”), the multi-specialist in fresh food businesses and food retail in France, from Ardian. Prosol’s existing shareholders and management team will reinvest alongside the Apollo Funds. Founde
